# identifier

**Instance Property**

An optional identifier for the region.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var identifier: AnyHashable? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value to identify the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerRegion] in subsequent pointer interaction delegate calls.

## Configuring a region

- **rect**: The rectangle bounds of the region.
- **latchingAxes**: Axes along which the region latches after a primary click.
